message.body: It was amazing, and now it's freezing!!! I just used my soap it was awesome. Are you away this coming weekend?
That sounds like a fun night!!!
I wish I had made it :). Next time

OMg. that night was insane I was complete brown out. Kyle tried to make out with me and i was like DUDE - you are really hot- BUT NO put me in a cab. THANK YOU! Yes, I am away until Sat - Wed. BUT, I miss you! What are you doing in an hour can i call you? I have a phone meeting with ingrid’s friend for her business. I think you are right about everything re ZK. I need to focus on finding work. Armen wants to meet but he is far away. I don’t know how to get there
and i really want to do henna
and make you a match.com profile
cassie and angie ask about you every day
Hahaga. No worries. We can do henna when you return ! I'm going to try and have a dinner at my place next month!
Awww I love both those girls
just got off the phone from my meeting.
you are so right. all the time.
￼^ this is what pregnancy looks like. this is crazy. omg.
